principles.scroll: Use Lenis for buttery smooth scrolling. Elements should parallax at different speeds.
principles.reveal: Text elements should stagger in from bottom (y: 20 -> y: 0) with opacity fade.
principles.hover: Images should zoom slightly (scale 1.05) and darken/lighten on hover.

sections: The Villa Collection (Horizontal Scroll of A1-A5)
ROI Timeline (Recharts Line Chart - Gold Line)
Founders (Hardik Sheth & Tejas Dadia - Use placeholders if no image, or generic businessman silhouette)

accessibility.contrast: Ensure Gold text is large enough or on dark enough background. Use Ivory for main body text.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL `lenis` for smooth scrolling immediately. It is critical for the 'Premium' feel.
DO NOT use standard Tailwind colors. Use the custom `cube-` palette defined above.
Images A1-A9 and Video are LOCAL. Assume they are in `/public/assets/` or similar. If not found, create a placeholder component that says 'Missing Asset: [Name]'.
For the Founders section, if no image is provided, use a stylish Typography-based card.
The 'Investment vs Lifestyle' toggle is a key interaction. Make it a large, pill-shaped switch that morphs the content below it.
Use 'Playfair Display' for all Headings. Use 'Manrope' for all Body text.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
